05:54:00 SQL> ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss';

Session altered.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.00
05:54:00 SQL> 05:54:00 SQL> --
05:54:00 SQL> -- merge.sql
05:54:00 SQL> --
05:54:00 SQL> 
05:54:00 SQL> -- I use this script to merge data from ibs_stage into ibs15min.
05:54:00 SQL> 
05:54:00 SQL> 
05:54:00 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_old	  (tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
05:54:00 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_dups_old(tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
05:54:00 SQL> 
05:54:00 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.57
05:54:00 SQL> RENAME ibs15min TO ibs_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.03
05:54:01 SQL> 
05:54:01 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_dups_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.32
05:54:01 SQL> RENAME ibs_dups TO ibs_dups_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.09
05:54:01 SQL> 
05:54:01 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs_dups COMPRESS AS
05:54:01   2  SELECT
05:54:01   3  tkr
05:54:01   4  ,(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')+(epochsec/24/3600))ydate
05:54:01   5  ,clse
05:54:01   6  FROM ibs_stage
05:54:01   7  UNION
05:54:01   8  SELECT tkr,ydate,clse
05:54:01   9  FROM ibs_old
05:54:01  10  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:03.25
05:54:04 SQL> 
05:54:04 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs15min COMPRESS AS
05:54:04   2  SELECT
05:54:04   3  tkr
05:54:04   4  ,ydate
05:54:04   5  ,AVG(clse)clse
05:54:04   6  FROM ibs_dups
05:54:04   7  GROUP BY tkr,ydate
05:54:04   8  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:02.23
05:54:06 SQL> 
05:54:06 SQL> ANALYZE TABLE ibs15min COMPUTE STATISTICS;

Table analyzed.

Elapsed: 00:00:03.13
05:54:10 SQL> 
05:54:10 SQL> -- rpt
05:54:10 SQL> 
05:54:10 SQL> SELECT
05:54:10   2  tkr
05:54:10   3  ,(sysdate - MAX(ydate))*24*60 minutes_age
05:54:10   4  ,MIN(ydate)
05:54:10   5  ,COUNT(ydate)
05:54:10   6  ,MAX(ydate)FROM
05:54:10   7  ibs15min
05:54:10   8  GROUP BY tkr
05:54:10   9  ORDER BY tkr
05:54:10  10  /
